description:
Ape Escape 3 is a 3D platformer published and developed by Sony Computer Entertainment, released 
in 2005 for the Sony Playstation 2. Specter for the third time has escaped again, and this time,
he and his Pipo Monkey army has taken over Television and programs anyone who watches into a 
mindless couch potato. Even our previous heroes have fallen for the trap, and now its up to Kei
and Yumi to save the world from the control of Specter.
name: Ape Escape 3

1.0.00.description:
The first Public Release!
====

Please refer to the [README](https://github.com/aidanii24/ae3-archipelago) and [setup](https://github.com/aidanii24/ae3-archipelago/blob/main/worlds/ape_escape_3/docs/setup.md) documentation in the main repository for the feature list and guides on using this APWorld.

1.0.10.description:
Ape Escape 3 Archipelago v1.0.10
====
This is a bug fix release for most of the bugs reported during the first day of release.
## Features
- Progression Mode is now shown when running `/status`
## Fixes
### Logic
- Fixed Pipo Cameras in Winterville and Specter-TV Studio returning KeyErrors when checking for actors
- Fixed Locations in Space-TV Fortress Studio 1 placed in the wrong location
- Fixed mismatched entrances in Space-TV Fortress Studio 2
- Fixed missing entrance rule for The Emperor's Castle - Castle Walls and Eversummer Island - Village Pier
- Shuffle Type is now enforced after Preserve Channel
### Options
- Implemented `create_item()` method, as it is required for use with `Start_Inventory` option
- Fixed description of Progression Mode referencing an old name of one of the options
### Client
- Fixed `/deathlink` not doing anything
- `deathlink` status is now checked before anything else, even the functions inherited from CommonClient when handling receiving deathlink (e.g. the text that shows up when you receive a death).
- Receiving Deathlinks (should) no longer cause the client to send deathlinks
- Freaky Monkey Five levels now remain accessible after defeating their respective boss
- Fixed Post Game level not unlocking with Channel Key
- Fixed Pipo Camera checking for actors when setting is on `no_actors` instead of `enabled`
- Fixed RC Car Chassis not unlocking the RC Car gadget
### Regressions
- RC Car Chassis Shuffle will no longer automatically equip Chassis
### Known Issues
- Emulator Crash when checking certain phones
- Trying to swim in Midnight Bay without a Net may teleport you to a void level
1.0.10.title: v1.0.10

v1.0.20.description:
# Ape Escape 3 Archipelago v1.0.20
## Fixes
### Logic
- Fixed Pyramid Entrance in Mirage Town requiring any long-range attack (including morphs) instead of just the Slingshot
- Fixed certain Goal Targets having an access rule that asks for all valid locations needed to goal instead of only the certain amount needed required
- PostGameAccessRule Channel Key and After End will now use checking for 6 of any of the bosses being reachable as their access rule
### Client
- Receiving of Super Monkey morph is now handled better. This fixes Super Monkey not being received as a starting morph.
  - *Hopefully, this also fixes Super Monkey oftentimes disappearing some time after receiving it
- Fantasy Knight no longer can stay unlocked when another Morph is unlocked
- Pointers to Cellphone Data are now invalidated every (supposed) screen transition instead of immediately after it gets checked as a location
  - *Hopefully, this fixes the game crashes from checking these.
- Fixed No Water Net Enforcement mechanism often disabling music on respawn, and even sending you to a void level
### Miscellaneous
- Fixed the Cellphone names in Arctic Wonderland being switched
- Fixed some Descriptions of Goal Targets and Post Game Access Rules
### Known Issues
- Collection from other players will count towards Goal Targets and Post Game Access Rule
- No measure to prevent players from equipping the dummy morphs via Quick Morph menu
- Inaccurate Logic

[*] I cannot fully confirm these effects of this fixes at these time, so any feedback regarding them on this version is greatly appreciated!
v1.0.20.title: v1.0.20

v1.0.30.description:
# Ape Escape 3 Archipelago 1.0.30
## Features
- Last Channel Selected Slot is now remembered
## Fixes
### Logic
- Fixed Pipo Camera - Tomoki City checking for the wrong actor
- Gadgets and Morphs in `start_inventory` are now removed from the item pool
- Fixed Midnight Bay Port not requiring the Water Net alongside the Access Rule of long-range attacks to reach the Yard
- Shuffle Channel now properly uses the blacklisted first set channels of each Logic Preference
- Fixed Break Room Monkeys being included when disabled, and being enabled when not
- Fixed Cellphones in Bridge of Saru-mon's Castle being placed in the wrong stage/room
### Client
- Fixed Pipo Camera actor check returning True if no or any actors are present, when it should require all actors to be present
- Further Fixed No Water Net enforcement mechanism disabling mechanism from disabling music/teleporting you to the void. Previous implementation did not clear enough of the spawnpoint variables
- Removed check to not change progression when hovering over Tomoki/Specter1 levels once their respective bosses are defeated as this locks out any levels shuffled into these levels.
- Deathlinks will no longer be sent when deathlink is disabled
- Deathlink tag will now be updated when running `/deathlink`
- Location Cache is now cleared when trying to connect to a room different from the previous one, without restarting the client
- Cellphone checks now rely on GUI Status for confirming Cellphone Interactions instead of requiring the interact address to be invalidated with null values for every new check
- Items sent while the Client is closed will now be properly received
- Local Save System has been re-instated
- Client has now improved Item Handling
- GoalTarget and PostGameAccessRule now checks the local game state for monkeys and the local client save for locations whose status don't stay in memory or has to be removed from memory
- Equipment will now be resynced everytime the client re-connects with PCSX2
- Dummy Morphs that have not been collected will be locked when opening the Quick Morph menu
- Managing to use Morphs that you have not unlocked yet will now force their morph timer to 0, instead of setting their duration to 0 beforehand
### Miscellaneous
- Cellphone Locations now have more descriptive names
### Known Issues
- Inaccurate Logic

v1.0.40.description:
## Fixes
### Logic
- Improved enforcement of blacklisted channels from being placed at the beginning set of levels
- Enforcement of blacklisted channels no longer shuffles allowed levels in early set of levels
- Post Game Access Rule now properly excludes relevant locations set in the post-game set of levels, instead of only the very last level
- Fixed Post Game Access Rule now properly excludes Cellphones
- Fixed Logic Preference sharing data between instances, corrupting the progression access rules of channels
- Fixed Connect Regions not using the Logic Preference set by the world, ignoring the progression access rules set
- Fixed generation access rules returned by Goal Target and Post Game Access Rule not properly counting the locations relevant to them
- Updated Normal Logic Preference rules for "Airplane Squadron - Engine Room", regarding the spinning axels
- Fixed Access Rule generator generating access rules where a rule that requires multiple items counts as reachable if only one of those items is obtained instead of all of them
- Added an Access Rule from the Air Force Squadron to the Blimp, now requiring the Sky Flyer
- Fixed "Ukkilun - The Big City" being placed in the Theater Audience Hall instead of the actual theater stage
### Client
- Fixed Last Channel Slot Selected feature not working when the last shuffled level entered is normally later than the amount of channels unlocked
### Miscellaneous
- Fixed names of Cellphones in Arctic Wonderland being switched

v1.0.50.description:
## Features
- New client commands
  - `/channels` displays all of your unlocked channels in order
  - `/remaining_post_game` displays remaining potential locations required for unlocking post game
- `/remaining` will now also display a counter of checked locations over total required
## Fixes
- Fixed missing access rule for the Far Cliff in the Canyon in Wild West Town
- Fixed misplaced monkey in the Ruined Temple in Eversummer Island
- Fixed Break Room in Mirage Town asking for the Carpet Ride event instead of the Super Monkey morph
- Break Rooms option are now properly respected and will properly remove Break Room monkeys from logic if disabled
- Fixed misidentified Access Rule for the Break Rooms in The Big City
## Adjustments
- The starting area of Mount Amazing in Casual Logic Preference now only asks for either the Sky Flyer or Miracle Ninja instead of also counting the Cyber Ace
## Miscellaneous
- Renamed `Post-Game Access Rule` to `Post_Game Condition`
- Fixed Cellphone about the Freezing Water in Arctic Wonderland having the wrong color in its name
v1.0.50.title: v1.0.50

v1.0.60.description:
## Hotfix
05/20/2025
- Fixed Casual Logic Preference not requiring the Water Net to reach the button to open the Coral Cage in Studio 2 of Space-TV Fortress

## Additions
### Client
- Boss Channel's clear state can now be toggled to switch access between normal re-entry or Freeplay Mode (if the boss has been beaten)
  - Hold *Confirm Button* to allow access for Normal Re-entry
  - Hold *Select Button* to allow access to Freeplay Mode (Only if the corresponding boss has been beaten)
## Changelog
### Logic
- Fixed monkeys in Kung-Fu Alley - Alleys having their regions switched
- The Disc Plane in Airplane Squadron is now its own region in logic, in between the Military Jets and Blimp. Any flying/gliding/long-reach equipment is now also required for the monkey/event in this area, and for accessing the blimp from the jet, and vice versa.
- All uses of random in world generation now uses the world's instance of random for more consistent and reproducible generation
- Increased channel slots early slot blacklisted channels can be swapped with. Hopefully this reduces generations where bosses are all bunched up together
### Client
- Client will now properly auto-select the last channel (slot) you've entered, instead of re-correcting it every time after returning to the hub (when Shuffle Channel is enabled)
- Client will now re-check Post Game Condition when in the Travel Station
v1.0.60.title: v1.0.60

v1.0.70.description:
## Logic
- Tomoki City Entrance Area now also allows the Sky Flyer as in-logic for access on Hard Logic Preference
- Casual Logic Preference is now easier on bosses, most of which now asks for any non-Super Monkey morph
- Fixed Group Progression Mode not placing keys correctly, and missing placing a key on the penultimate boss when After End is the Post Game Condition
- Fixed Group Progression Mode not generating the correct amount of Keys for After End Post-Game Condition
## Client
- Fixed Items being skipped when received while the client is closed
## Miscellaneous
- Setup Guide now mentions local saves and host.yaml settings
- Added Acknowledgements section to README.md
- Spoiler Text will now show Channel Order when Shuffle Channel is enabled
v1.0.70.title: v1.0.70

v1.0.71.description:
## Logic 
- Saru-mon's Castle Dungeon Flamethrower will now count any long-range attack as in-logic when crossing it in Casual Logic Preference
## Client
- Fixed Auto Equip command mention and changing the Freeplay Status instead of Auto Equip
- Fixed Starting Gadgets not being auto-equipped regardless of the Auto-Equip Option
- Fixed Death Links not being sent after receiving them

v1.0.72.description:
## Changelog
- In The Hot Springs, Monkeys in the changing room now have their own access rule without affecting the access between the Outside Entrance and the Inner Baths
- Casual Logic for the Changing Room monkeys no longer counts Genie Dancer as in-logic in The Hot Springs
- Fixed Missing Access Rule between the Inner Baths and the Changing Room in The Hot Springs
- In Eversummer Island Casual Logic, crossing to the Cliffs from the second, higher Island using Cyber Ace directly is no longer in logic
v1.0.72.title: v1.0.72

v1.0.80expr3.description:
## Features
- `resync_keys` Command allows you to manually resync Channel Keys
## Changelog
- Channel Keys and Unlocked Stages are now also enforced when a Channel Key is received instead of only during channel select
- Channel Keys are now also resynced when equipment is being resynced

v2.0.00.description:
# **Full Release**
## Major Features Recap
- **New Progression Modes** with *Quadruples*, *Randomize* and *Open*!
- **Channel control** options for forcibly pushing channels to either end-game, post-game or blacklisted altogether
- **Shoppingsanity** option
- **Glitch Logic** implementation
- **Location Groups** addition
- **Universal Tracker** Integration
## Changelog since last Beta:
- Fixed Location Group name "Music disc" typo
- Fixed UT regeneration error due to missing regeneration of excluded locations.
- Fixed "Expensive" Shop Items from becoming in logic on Sphere 1
v2.0.00.title: v2.0.00

v2.0.00-beta.2.description:
# Ape Escape 3 Archipelago v2.0.00beta 2
**<!> Breaking Option Changes**
**<!> Breaking host.yaml Changes**
## Features
### Options
- **Save State Slot** (Range, default: 0, range: 0, 11-255) - Choose which Slot the game will auto save state into if enabled.
### host.yaml
- **Auto Save State** - The client is now able to save state at certain points of the game. When it saves can be configured:
  - `room_transition` Save State when navigating between rooms
  - `items_received` Save State when receiving a progressive item
  - `locations_checked` Save State when checking a location
- **Auto Load State** - When in the title screen, and if the previous known save is a save state, auto load the save state upon connection on a newly launched client
### Client
- New Commands:
  - `save_state` to save state to the slot specified in the options yaml
  - `load_state` to load state to the slot specified in the options yaml
## Changelog
### Logic
- Chammy Mo now asks for any shooting or flying equipment in Casual Logic Preference (Suggested: dewutt610)
### Client
- Removed local JSON System Save file in favor of in-game saves for external and volatile data
- When Early Free Play is enabled, Free Play can now be set by holding L1 or L2 after confirming a channel on the Warp Gate
- Pipo Monkeys and Cellphones will no longer be checked in Freeplay Mode 
### Options
- Early Free Play is now ENABLED by default
### host.yaml
- Auto Equip is now ENABLED by default
## Fixes
- Fixed leading whitespace in client name (thedragon005)
- Fixed Bosses not adhering to Goal Target Override (Reported: dorifrog)
- Defeating Specter Final will no longer play the ending cutscene/credits and will teleport the player back to the Travel Station instead
v2.0.00-beta.2.title: 2.0.00-beta.2

v2.0.00-beta.3.description:
# Ape Escape 3 Archipelago v2.0.00-beta.3
`<!> BREAKING YAML CHANGES`
`<!> BREAKING host.yaml CHANGES`
## Changelog
- New `YAML Options`
  - Goal Target `Bonus Collector`
  - Post Game Condition `Shop`
  - `Shoppingsanity`
    - `disabled` Do not count Shop Items as checks
    - `enabled` Shop Items become check as long as you've reached a farmable area
    - `collection` The amount of Shop Items you have bought become checks (Certain Shop Items with specific unlocks will still be checked as their unique selves)
    - `progressive` Shop Items become checks, but the amount available for purchase will depend on your current progression through the game.
    - `restock` Shop Items become checks, but the amount available for purchase will depend on the amount of Shop Stocks you've obtained!
  - `Restock Progression` Determines the amount of Shop Stocks to generate, and how many Shop Items each one unlocks
  - `Cheap Items Minimum Requirement` Determine how far into the game cheap items become in-logic, aside from reaching a farmable area
  - `Cheap Items Early Amount` Determine how many items of each Cheap Item Category can be in logic immediately at the beginning of the game.
  - `Farm Logic Sneaky Borgs` Determine if areas with Sneaky-borgs count as a farmable area.
  - `Extra Shop Stocks`
  - `Enable Monkey Mart`
  - `Hints from Hint Books`
  - `Lucky Ticket Consolation Effects`
  - `Consolation Effects Whitelist`
    - `Hint Random`
    - `Hint Progressive`
    - `Check Random`
    - `Check Progressive`
    - `Check PGC`
    - `Check GT` (Will not be selected if Goal Target has less than 10 locations)
    - `Bypass PGC` (default disabled)
    - `Instant Goal` (default disabled)
- Adjusted `YAML Options`
  - `Goal Target Override` Now takes a percentage amount of value between 1 to 100
  - `Shuffle Chassis` will separate RC Cars received from AP from RC Cars received from the Shopping Area.
  - `Shuffle Morph Stocks` will separate Morph Stocks received from AP from Morph Stocks bought from the Shopping Area
- New `host.yaml Settings`
  - `whitelist_bypass_pgc` Allow players to include "Bypass Post Game Condition" as a Lucky Ticket Consolation Effect
  - `whitelist_instant_goal` Allow players to include "Instant Goal" as a Lucky Ticket Consolation Effect
## Bug Fixes
- Client will no longer erroneously send false checks while interacting with the Data Desk
- Client will now validate world generation version used to generate the game, and refuse a connection if it detects an incompatible world
## Known Issues
- Enabling `Shoppingsanity` incurs a 0.2% Generation failure rate
- Sending checks for prolonged periods in the Shopping Area may sometimes prevent them from being sent until returning to the TV Station
v2.0.00-beta.3.title: v2.0.00-beta.3

v2.0.00-beta.3+1.description:
# Ape Escape 3 Archipelago v2.0.00-beta.3+1

## Changelog
- PGC Clearance is now saved onto game memory, allowing Bypass PGC Effect to be persistent between sessions.
- Morph Stock will no longer appear temporarily in the Monkey Mart if the player has no morphs yet
- Shopping Items that require Specter2 to be caught will now appear properly
- Specter Battle! Channel now remains unlocked even after capturing Specter 1
- Shuffle Channel Enforcement is now more consistent.
v2.0.00-beta.3+1.title: v2.0.00-beta.3+1

v2.0.00-beta.4r3.description:
## Changelog
### General
- Added Location Groups, which includes per location category and per region groups. Some examples of Location Groups include but are not limited to:
  - `Monkey Racers`
  - `Bosses`
  - `Tomoki City - Tomoki Tower Entrance Area Monkeys`
  - `Hobby Shop`
### Options
- `expert` Logic Preference - Major known glitches can now be in logic.
- `hip_drop_storage_logic` - Determine if Hip Drop Storage should be included in logic.
- `prolonged_quad_jump_logic` - Determines if using Quad Jumps for extended periods of time should count in logic
### Logic
- In Normal and Casual, any morph or gadget that can strike buttons is now recognized as required by Logic to pass the Entrance Gate in Saru-mon's Castle
- In Normal and Casual, any morph or gadget that can strike buttons is recognized as required by Logic between the Entrance Area of Space-TV Fortress and the Studio Zone
- Fuji-Chan no longer requires anything else other than a Net or any other Monkey-Catching capable Morphs in Hard difficulty
- Slight adjustments to other logic
## Fixes
### Generation
- Fixed Generation failing due to Hint from Hint Books attempting to place an item to a blacklisted Hint Book Location
- Fixed mismatch in count between Locations and Items that occur due an incorrect adjustment made for Hint books being pre-filled, improving Generation Success Rate.

## Hotfix
- Made Entrance Logic for Saru-mon's Castle gates and Space-TV Fortress Entrance Button more strict
v2.0.00-beta.4r3.title: v2.0.00-beta.4

v2.0.00-beta.5.description:
**:warning:  BREAKING GENERATION CHANGES**
**:warning: BREAKING OPTIONS CHANGES**
## Additions
- **Universal Tracker support, with Client Integration!**
## Fixes
### Options
- Goal Target Override no longer treats a value of 100% as "use default"
- Goal Target Override now uses a value of 0% to use default amounts
### Logic
- Fixed missing stricter logic for certain buttons and wheels in the entrances of Saru-mon's Castle and Space-TV Fortress [from beta.4 HOTFIX]
### Generation
- Fixed Cellphones and Cameras becoming enabled as locations even if they were left disabled [from beta.4 HOTFIX]
- Fixed *Jimo - Midnight Bay* not being placed and generated into the multiworld
### Misc
- Fixed missing descriptions of some client commands (multiserver/kivy error)
- Fixed typo on a location name
v2.0.00-beta.5.title: v2.0.00-beta.5

v2.0.00-beta.5+1.description:
:warning: **BREAKING GENERATION CHANGES**
 :warning: **BREAKING CLIENT CHANGES**
## General
- Fixed location group generation cross-polluting each group (Fixed Shoppingsanity Client errors, and other location checking from the Client)
## Generation
- Fixed missing entrances to Midnight Bay - Sewer - Aquarium
v2.0.00-beta.5+1.title: v2.0.00-beta.5+1

v2.0.00-beta.5+2.description:
## Client
- Fixed Aki constantly insisting on giving Super Monkey that led to failing Channel Randomization enforcement when Break Room Monkeys is set to "Early"
- Deathlinks will no longer trigger in the TV Station or Shopping Area if a Text Box or Shop Menu is open
- Fixed game booting the player out early and/or failing to spawn Break Room monkeys when they receive a Shop Stock mid-level
v2.0.00-beta.5+2.title: v2.0.00-beta.5+2

v2.0.00beta-1.description:
# Ape Escape 3 Archipelago v2.0.00beta-1
**< ! > Breaking YAML Changes!**
## Overview
- New **Progression Types** added, consisting of `quadruples`, `open` and `randomize`
- **Goal Target Override** allows you to customize the amount of targets needed to check for goal!
- **Post Game Condition** now splits its categories between individual yaml options, providing better control and allows mix and matching Condition categories. These categories include `monkeys`, `bosses`, `cameras`, `cellphones`, and `keys`
- New Channel Control options with **Push Channel**, **Post Channel** and **Blacklist Channel**
- `world` Progression Type no longer forces bosses to hold keys
- `preserve_channels` now take names of channels instead of choosing from presets
- `/resync_keys` has been changed to just `/resync`, which also forces other important items, such as gadgets and morphs to be resynced.
- `/channels` Client command will now feature dividers between channels, representing the sets unlocked by Channels Keys or Post Game Condition, similarly to how the channel order is written in spoiler.
v2.0.00beta-1.title: v2.0.00beta-1

v2.0.1r2.description:
## Changelog
### Enhancements
- Prepared for upcoming breaking changes in AP Core
- "Midnight Bay - Port - Jump to Yard" and and "Midnight Bay - Port - Jump to Front Port" now considers Sky Flyer as in logic (Boost Fly)
- "Airplane Squadron - Commercial Plane - Slope Up" no longer requires any item to be in logic (Door Clip)
## Fixes
- Fixed "Midnight Bay - Port - Jump to Yard"  and "Midnight Bay - Port - Jump to Front Port" requiring any Gliding item to only allowing Cyber Ace in Hard Mode (other logic for this entrance remains the same)
- "Midnight Bay - Port - Jump to Front Port" Casual Logic now requires both any Attack gadget and Swim (for the button)
- Fixed "Airplane Squadron - First Squadron - Yellow Plane Door" Normal Logic containing Hard Logic requirements
v2.0.1r2.title: v2.0.1
